mapper.select: SELECT UserNo FROM ( SELECT UserNo,beat_card_firsttime FROM beat_card WHERE date_format(beat_card_date, '%Y%m%d') = date_format( date_add(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 DAY), '%Y%m%d' ) ) as baseTable WHERE baseTable.beat_card_firsttime <= '080000';

SELECT UserNo FROM ( SELECT UserNo,beat_card_lasttime FROM beat_card WHERE date_format(beat_card_date, '%Y%m%d') = date_format( date_add(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 DAY), '%Y%m%d' ) ) as baseTable WHERE baseTable.beat_card_lasttime >= '210000';
